languages.text: "Ты погрузилась в особую эльдарскую медитацию, верно?"

traits.locale_text: [драфт] это и есть эльдарская медитация? расскажи подробнее

languages.text: "You were deep in a special Aeldari meditation, weren't you?"
languages.original_text: "Ты погрузилась в особую эльдарскую медитацию, верно?"

traits.locale_text: "You were deep in a special Aeldari meditation, weren't you?"
"You were deep in a special Aeldari meditation, weren't you?"
"You were deep in a special Aeldari meditation, weren't you?"
"You were deep in a special Aeldari meditation, weren't you?"

languages.text: «Estabas sumida en algún tipo de trance Aeldari especial, ¿no es así?».
languages.original_text: "You were deep in a special Aeldari meditation, weren't you?"

traits.locale_text: «Estabas sumida en algún tipo de trance Aeldari especial, ¿no es así?».

languages.text: 「アエルダリ式の瞑想に浸っていたんだろう？」
languages.original_text: "You were deep in a special Aeldari meditation, weren't you?"

traits.locale_text: 「アエルダリ式の瞑想に浸っていたんだろう？」

languages.text: “你刚才是在进行艾达灵族特有的冥想，对吗？”
languages.original_text: "You were deep in a special Aeldari meditation, weren't you?"

traits.locale_text: “你刚才是在进行艾达灵族特有的冥想，对吗？”

languages.text: « Vous étiez plongée dans une profonde méditation aeldari, n'est-ce pas ? »
languages.original_text: "You were deep in a special Aeldari meditation, weren't you?"

traits.locale_text: « Vous étiez plongée dans une profonde méditation aeldari, n'est-ce pas ? »

languages.text: "Ihr wart tief in einer speziellen Aeldari-Meditation versunken, nicht wahr?"
languages.original_text: "You were deep in a special Aeldari meditation, weren't you?"

traits.locale_text: "Ihr wart tief in einer speziellen Aeldari-Meditation versunken, nicht wahr?"

languages.text: "Şu özel Aeldari meditasyonuna dalmıştın, değil mi?"
languages.original_text: "You were deep in a special Aeldari meditation, weren't you?"

traits.locale_text: "Şu özel Aeldari meditasyonuna dalmıştın, değil mi?"
